Cropper

  • Author: Chen Fengyuan
  • License: MIT license
  • Website: www.fengyuanchen.github.io/cropperjs

Cropper.js is a JavaScript library for cropping image.

With the Cropper.js, you can select an specific area of an image, and then upload the coordinates data to server-side to crop the image, or crop the image on browser-side directly.

Image Cropping Utility

Tower file input

  • Author: StrutTower
  • License: MIT license
  • Website: www.github.com/StrutTower/tower-file-input

Image Upload & Preview

This is a simple plugin that works as a UI upgrade to the default HTML file input. To download the image, use the Select Files button. To clear the field, use the clear button.

xZoom

  • Author: Azat Ahmedov & Elman Guseynov
  • License: Apache License 2.0
  • Website: www.github.com/payalord

Easyzoom

  • Author: Matt Hinchliffe
  • License: MIT License
  • Website: www.github.com/i-like-robots/EasyZoom

Image Zoom Utility

  • Porthole
